SEARCH

Package raft

package raft
Implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm

This implementation of Raft builds on top of the remote library by enabling every Raft peer to act as both caller and callee of a set of remote function calls.

  • Class
    Description
    AppendEntriesResult
    Represents the result of an attempt to append entries to the log in the Raft consensus algorithm.
    LogEntry
    Represents a log entry in the Raft distributed consensus algorithm.
    LogUtil
    Utility class for configuring and obtaining a Logger instance with a custom format.
    RaftInterface
    RaftInterface -- this is the "service interface" that is implemented by each Raft peer using the remote library from Lab 1.
    RaftPeer
    RaftPeer class represents a Raft peer node that interacts with others using remote calls -- each RaftPeer supports a Service interface to accept incoming remote calls per RaftInterface -- each RaftPeer holds a list of stub interfaces to request remote calls per RaftInferface -- all remote calls are implemented using the underlying remote object library
    RaftPeer.State
    RaftPeer states
    StatusReport
    The StatusReport class encapsulates the status information of a Raft node.
    VoteResult
    Represents the result of a vote request in the Raft consensus algorithm.
